duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle complex litigation matters from inception to trial, including preparation of pleadings and briefs, managing discovery and depositions, and conducting legal research, analysis, and writing.
Proficient in Microsoft Word, Outlook, Excel, and e-discovery platforms.
Have excellent writing, research, negotiation, and communication skills, and be able to handle multiple priorities in a timely and professional manner.
Conducting legal research, analysis, and writing.
